survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness, frequency, and overall satisfaction with meetings in the workplace to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you attend meetings in a typical workweek?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you attend meetings in a typical workweek?

questions.question_text: What percentage of meetings you attend do you find productive?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale for easy interpretation.

script.question_text: What percentage of meetings you attend do you find productive?

questions.question_text: What are the main reasons meetings are unproductive? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q2 answer is 0-25%, 26-50%, or 51-75%
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes to allow multiple selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: What are the main reasons meetings are unproductive? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Show if Q2 answer is 0-25%, 26-50%, or 51-75%

questions.question_text: How often do meetings start on time?

script.question_text: How often do meetings start on time?

questions.question_text: Which meeting format do you prefer?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to understand format preferences.

script.question_text: Which meeting format do you prefer?

questions.question_text: What tools or methods would improve meeting effectiveness? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to gather improvement ideas.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: What tools or methods would improve meeting effectiveness? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the duration of most meetings?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the duration of most meetings?

questions.question_text: Do you feel meetings are necessary for your role?
answer_options: Some are necessary, but many could be emails
No, most could be replaced with emails or async updates

questions.question_text: What is the ideal length for a typical meeting?

questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with an 'Other' option.

script.question_text: What is the ideal length for a typical meeting?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions to improve workplace meetings.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.
